function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tourists avoiding high-risk areas","Impact":"Reduction in tourism revenue for high-risk areas","Mitigation":"Implementing health and safety measures to reduce perceived risk","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Tourists, local residents, businesses in high-risk areas","Owner":"Local governments, tourism boards, businesses"},{"Description":"Behavioral changes in response to perceived risk","Impact":"Change in tourist preferences and behavior","Mitigation":"Providing accurate information, implementing safety protocols, promoting low-risk destinations","Technologies":"Information platforms, contactless payment systems, hygiene monitoring tools","People":"Tourists, travel agencies, destination management organizations","Owner":"Government authorities, travel companies, destination management organizations"},{"Description":"Demographic variation in response to perceived risk","Impact":"Different reactions to risk based on cultural and socio-psychological factors","Mitigation":"Customizing communication and safety measures to different demographic groups","Technologies":"Multilingual communication tools, cultural sensitivity training, targeted marketing strategies","People":"Tourists from different cultural backgrounds, individuals with varying risk tolerances","Owner":"Marketing agencies, tourism boards, cultural organizations"}]}
